org.gridgain.grid.cache.query
Interface GridCacheQueryBase<K,V>

All Superinterfaces:
Closeable, GridMetadataAware, Serializable
All Known Subinterfaces:
GridCacheQuery<K,V>, GridCacheReduceQuery<K,V,R1,R2>, GridCacheTransformQuery<K,V,T>
public interface GridCacheQueryBase<K,V>
extends GridMetadataAware, Closeable

Base API for all supported types of cache queries: GridCacheQuery, GridCacheReduceQuery, GridCacheTransformQuery.

Wiki & Forum:

pageSize

void pageSize(int pageSize)
Sets result page size. If not provided, GridCacheQueryBase.DFLT_PAGE_SIZE will be used. Results are returned from queried nodes one page at a tme.

Parameters:
pageSize - Page size.

keepAll

void keepAll(boolean keepAll)
Sets whether or not to keep all query results local. If not - only the current page is kept locally. Default value is true.

Parameters:
keepAll - Keep results or not.

keepAll

boolean keepAll()
Gets query keepAll flag.

Query keepAll flag.

includeBackups

void includeBackups(boolean incBackups)
Sets whether or not to include backup entries into query result. This flag is false by default.

Parameters:
incBackups - Query includeBackups flag.

includeBackups

boolean includeBackups()
Gets query includeBackups flag.

Returns:
Query includeBackups flag.

readThrough

void readThrough(boolean readThrough)
Flag indicating whether values should be read-through from persistent storage if not available in memory. Values may be nulls if 'invalidation' mode is set on cache transactions.

Parameters:
readThrough - Flag indicating whether to read through.

readThrough

boolean readThrough()
Gets query readThrough flag.

Returns:
Query readThrough flag.

remoteKeyFilter

void remoteKeyFilter(@Nullable
                     GridClosure<Object[],GridPredicate<? super K>> factory)
Optional filter factory to be used on queried nodes to create key filters prior to visiting or returning key-value pairs to user. The factory is a closure that accepts array of objects provided by GridCacheQuery.closureArguments(Object...) or GridCacheReduceQuery.closureArguments(Object...) or GridCacheTransformQuery.closureArguments(Object...) methods as a parameter and returns predicate filter for keys.

If factory is set, then it will be invoked for every query execution. Only keys that pass the filter will be included in query result. If state of the filter changes after each query execution, then factory should return a new filter for every execution.

Parameters:
factory - Optional factory closure to create key filters.

remoteValueFilter

void remoteValueFilter(@Nullable
                       GridClosure<Object[],GridPredicate<? super V>> factory)
Optional filter factory to be used on queried nodes to create value filters prior to visiting or returning key-value pairs to user. The factory is a closure that accepts array of objects provided by GridCacheQuery.closureArguments(Object...) or GridCacheReduceQuery.closureArguments(Object...) or GridCacheTransformQuery.closureArguments(Object...) methods as a parameter and returns predicate filter for values.

If factory is set, then it will be invoked for every query execution. Only values that pass the filter will be included in query result. If state of the filter changes after each query execution, then factory should return a new filter for every execution.

Parameters:
factory - Optional factory closure to create value filters.

metrics

GridCacheQueryMetrics metrics()
Gets query metrics.

Returns:
Query metrics.
